about_the_game:
The Boss is back! And he has found a new, and much bigger, factory to repurpose for the production of his cursed products. You and your fellow workers find yourselves in the middle of the fierce competition between the monsters than haunt this new location. How many nights can you last?

Welcome to your new life:

In this high-stress, multitasking challenge, your day begins with fueling the two boilers to get the machinery running. You'll need to assemble robot toys on the three production lines, using a wrench to fix any machines that break down. Fail to keep up with the daily quotas and the ever present Boss will quickly show his displeasure.

Each new day brings new obstacles – from cursed toys coming to life and terrifying Clockwork Demons disrupting the machinery to the monstrous Competitors intending to snatch you away to their mines. Stay alert, stay vigilant and above all always keep the production going.

Succeed as a team, or perish in chaos:

Though you can work alone a team effort can truly make or break a successful business. There is plenty to do in the Factory after all, so everyone will be able to fill an essential role. And the Boss will be there to make sure everyone keeps working hard. No slackers allowed!

Do well and be rewarded with new outfits, new challenges and new Achievements as you unlock them! You may just make Employee of the Month~

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Debian Bullseye or Ubuntu 20 or equivalent
  • Processor: i3 2100 or AMD FX-4100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX950 or Radeon HD 7970 with at least 3GB of VRAM
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Debian Bullseye or Ubuntu 20 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1060 or RX580 with at least 4GB of VRAM

short_description: Keep a 19th century factory running at all costs in this horrifying co-op survive-the-night game. Your boss is as unforgiving as the cold steel machinery that surrounds you. Keep the Boss happy and fend off the monsters that haunt the factory as you race to produce cursed children's toys.
